授業方法:
This course is currently planned for face-to-face format. Every content lesson will based on an academic reading and consist of an in-person lecture supported by PowerPoint slides and student notetaking. Some lessons will be designated for Unit Tests, and the final lesson will likely be designated for course review and completion of the Reflective Writing Assignment.

(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
Data recorded from face-to-face-classes will be broadcast on-demand. Links to the recorded lessons will be provided on LUNA. Students permitted to take classes online are expected to watch on-demand lectures and complete the required assessments according to the course schedule.

トピック.授業外学習2: All course materials will be available and distributed on LUNA. It is the student's responsibility to access and use the course readings and other important course materials provided on LUNA.

評価.教科書Required texts0: All reading materials will be provided by the instructor on LUNA. Students can expect approximately 8-15 pages of academic English reading preparation per week.
